    @allure.title('Test successful order from different entry points')
    @pytest.mark.parametrize('entry_point', ['head', 'foot'])
    def test_successful_order_flow(self, driver, entry_point):
        with allure.step('Generate test data'):
            order_data = generate_order_data()
            print(f"\nTest data: {order_data}")  # Для отладки
    
        with allure.step('Open main page and accept cookies'):
            main_page = MainPage(driver)
            main_page.go_to_site()
            main_page.accept_cookies()
    
        with allure.step(f'Start order from {entry_point} button'):
            if entry_point == 'head':
                main_page.click_head_order_button()
            else:
                main_page.scroll_to_footer()
                main_page.click_foot_order_button()
    
        with allure.step('Fill first step of order form'):
            order_page = OrderPage(driver)
            order_page.fill_first_step_form(
                order_data['name'],
                order_data['lastname'],
                order_data['address'],
                order_data['metro'],
                order_data['phone']
            )
    
        with allure.step('Fill second step of order form'):
            order_page.fill_second_step_form(
                order_data['date'],
                order_data['rental_period'],
                order_data['color'],
                order_data['comment']
            )
    
        with allure.step('Confirm order'):
>           order_page.confirm_order()
